8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdur-Rahman bin Abi Bakrah narrated from his father that :the Messenger of Allah said: "The two months of Eid will not both be deficient: Ramadn and Dhul-Hijjah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ شَهْرَا عِيدٍ لاَ يَنْقُصَانِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About: The Two Months Of Eid Will Not Both Be Deficient
